name: Follow The White Line
description:
Follow the White Line is a fast paced, fun, elegant and simple finger-runner. Just keep your finger on the screen, stay inside the white line and walk through the course. Don't step into obstacles or traps and run as far as you can.

It is a great pick up and play game especially for children which will test their reaction and attentiveness, as well as help to improve their hand-eye coordination.

Easy to play, but SO difficult to master!

Beat the highscores and challenge your friends!

· One-touch control system!
· Simple and addictive gameplay!
. Game Center challenges!
. FREE!
